product_name: REI Sport T-Shirt - Women's Plus Sizes
long_description: With smooth, quick-drying, moisture-wicking fabric, the REI Sport T-shirt for women in plus sizes is sure to keep you comfortable during training runs, gym workouts or other high-energy activities. Moisture-wicking fabric dries fast and mesh fabric along the back enhances ventilation. Fabric provides UPF 50+ protection from harmful solar rays. Seams are designed to reduce chafing during active motion. Reflective details increase visibility in low light. The women's REI Sport T-shirt in plus sizes offers an active fit that moves with you during workouts.
short_description: With smooth, quick-drying, moisture-wicking fabric, the REI Sport T-shirt for women in plus sizes is sure to keep you comfortable during training runs, gym workouts or other high-energy activities.
